stages.headline: Translate & Solve: /K n + 18 = 125 K/
stages.problemText: Eighteen more than the number n is 125. What is the value of n?
stages.solutionSteps: 1. Set up equation: n + 18 = 125. 2. Subtract 18 from both sides. 3. n = 107.
stages.customInstructions: Translate the sentence into an equation and write the value of n.
